name: Impling Fate Merger
description:
play as a little impling/dragon and navigate the depths of the underground

GMS2 version

AD - move

W - jump

left click - select an entity

right click - swap entities

Space - cancel selection

Unity

A D - walk

Space - jump

left click - swap location with another entity

This game was made in 48 hour for the GMTK game jam of 2021

Due to the time constraint,  and this jam being a first for some of us we made two version of the game, one in gamemaker and one in unity, they are different but contain  the same core mechanic.

CREDITS

Lunis - quantum ivy (art/gms2  version)

RNA - Unity version

Paletreker - music and sounds

UNITY

contains 3 different versions

MAC

WINDOWS

LINUX

KNOWN BUGS
